conversion is finished or not
[ADC Macros]

Check conversion status. More...


Defines

#define Is_adc_conv_finished()   ((ADCSRA & (1<<ADIF)) ? TRUE : FALSE)
#define Is_adc_conv_not_finished()   ((ADCSRA | ~(1<<ADIF)) ? TRUE : FALSE)
